summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear implemented via ChatRoom jump-to-message handler (instant jump + refetch-on-miss + toast) and MessageBubble stable DOM anchors + clickable reply preview. However, the diff also includes unrelated/auth changes and added meta files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated changes to Internet Identity auth hook (AuthClient/identity provider logic) that are not part of reply-preview jump behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to clickable reply preview jump/refetch/anchor behavior in the chat message list; no auth/Internet Identity changes were requested.
Not requested by BuildRequest requirements; appears to be internal documentation/state.

hallucinated_features.description: Added broad repository/file summary document (includes many claimed changes outside scope).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested deliverable for the feature; also references changes beyond the provided modified-file list.
